existing_features.title: Extend the admin-only subscription analytics to include a detailed per-workspace breakdown (business name, owner principal, subscription plan, start date, end date, canceled at, and derived status such as “No subscription”, “Active trial”, “Expired trial”, “Paid”, “Canceled”).

Add additional aggregated metrics to subscription analytics beyond the current counts, including at minimum: paid subscriptions split (monthly vs yearly) as percentages of total workspaces, and a count of free trials expiring soon (e.g., within the next 48 hours) computed using trial end dates.

Enhance the Subscription Analytics page UX with basic data exploration controls: client-side search by business name and quick filters by subscription status/plan (All, No subscription, Free trial active, Free trial expired, Monthly, Yearly, Canceled).

projectName: Expand admin subscription analytics with detailed workspace breakdown and richer metrics
